resources.string: Heart Beat is measured using the camera. Cover the camera with your finger.
Block the camera with your finger. The heart icon should get red and the diagram will start displaying your pulse. Allow 10 to 30 seconds until the circle gets fully blue.

No warranty is made that any of the calculations are accurate. The application does not attempt to substitute medical professionals or proper/licensed methods to calculate and measure PULSE, and engage in the practice of medicine.
